```{r}
rawdat <- read_csv("brms_model_data.csv")
```

```{r}
dat <- rawdat %>% 
  mutate(timecol = as.integer(as.factor(week)))

dat %>% 
  filter(new_cons > 0 ) %>% 
  summarise(mean(log(new_cons)), sd(log(new_cons)))

m0_f <- bf(new_cons ~ 0 + timecol + lockdown*pagerank*trans + (1 | id))

get_prior(m1_f, data=dat, family=zero_inflated_poisson())

m1_f <- bf(new_cons ~ 0 + timecol + lockdown + lockdown:pagerank + lockdown:trans + lockdown:pagerank:trans + (1 + timecol | id))



m0_priors <- c(
  prior(normal(0, 0.01), class=b), 
  prior(normal(0, 0.01), class=sd), 
  prior(beta(1, 1), class=zi), 
  prior(lkj(1), class=cor)
)
 
m0_prior_model <- brm(
  m1_f,
  dat,
  family=zero_inflated_poisson(),
  prior=m0_priors,
  sample_prior = "only",
  cores = 2,
  chains = 2,
  backend = "cmdstanr", 
  control = list(adapt_delta = 0.99))

pp_check(m0_prior_model, nsamples=100)

job::job(brm_result = {
  fit = update(
    m0_prior_model,
    sample_prior = T,
    cores = 2,
    chains = 2,
    backend = "cmdstanr"
  ) 
  pos_check =  pp_check(m0_testy, nsamples = 100)
})

summary(m0_testy)
hypothesis(m0_testy, "lockdownTRUE < lockdownFALSE")
hypothesis(m0_testy, "abs(lockdownTRUE:pagerank) > 0")
```
